name: From Space: Mission Pack - Molten Iron
summary: Mission Pack: Molten Iron is a DLC for From Space that will take your Horde Mode experience to the next level. Ramp up your gameplay with the addition of 2 new maps (Crucible and Steelworks), a weapon (Plasma Shotgun), 2 items (Bear Trap and Napalm Mine), and a perk (Protective Coveralls).
